howToDescription: Discover the correct word in 6 tries. After a try, you can check the color of each letter to help with your next guess.
howToRuleLength: Every guess must be a valid 5-letter word
correctExample: <char/> exists in the word and is in the right place
hintExample: <char/> exists in the word but is in the wrong place
incorrectExample: <char/> do not exist in the word in any place
